title: How to Aim in Counter Strike

steps.title: Get better.
steps.content: Get better. Stop finding a way to have better aim, you are the problem, go touch some grass and do aim lab 30 minutes per day. Enjoy the rest of this instructions.

steps.title: Place your crosshair on the enemies neck, when you see your enemy.
steps.content: Place your crosshair on the enemies neck, when you see your enemy. Aim towards the head.

steps.title: Click your mouse so as to shoot no more than a couple bullets, it will help control the recoil if you burst (2-3 shots) while moving your crosshair to follow your enemy.
steps.content: Click your mouse so as to shoot no more than a couple bullets, it will help control the recoil if you burst (2-3 shots) while moving your crosshair to follow your enemy.

steps.title: Avoid taking a long time to fire.
steps.content: Avoid taking a long time to fire. If the enemy is a decent player then you'll end up dead if you waste time.

steps.title: Strafe from side to side, when you are waiting for your crosshair to become small again.
steps.content: Strafe from side to side, when you are waiting for your crosshair to become small again.

steps.title: Shoot, once the crosshair is small again.
steps.content: Shoot, once the crosshair is small again.

steps.title: Resist hesitating to run up to his corpse and check for spare grenades or better weapons, once the guy is dead.
steps.content: Resist hesitating to run up to his corpse and check for spare grenades or better weapons, once the guy is dead.

steps.title: Remember not to reload your weapon until you're sure that the enemy is dead and there are no more enemies near you.
steps.content: Remember not to reload your weapon until you're sure that the enemy is dead and there are no more enemies near you.
